project.description: Build IMX8MQ Yocto SUMO with 4.14.98 kernel

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x
set -e
#MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.14.98-2.0.0_ga.xml MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.14.98-2.0.1_patch.xml GITSERVER="10.20.30.20" #chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa #ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
# initialize technexion github yocto repository echo ===== Repo init yocto from TechNexion github ===== ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u https://github.com/TechNexion/tn-imx-yocto-manifest.git -b sumo_4.14.y_GA-stable -m $MANUSCRIPT #sshpass -p '123456' ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u ssh://rdsw@${GITSERVER}/volume1/internal_git/edm/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b sumo-4.14.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT #${HOME}/bin/repo init -u ssh://rdsw@${GITSERVER}/volume1/internal_git/edm/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b sumo-4.14.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT echo ===== Repo sync yocto from TechNexion github ===== rm -fR sources/meta-tn-imx-bsp ${HOME}/bin/repo sync --force-sync
# Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts echo ===== Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts ===== sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/EULA_ACCEPTED=\n/echo "ACCEPT_FSL_EULA = \\"1\\"" >> conf\/local.conf\n/' sources/base/setup-environment

#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF # u-boot-edm.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip-bootscript" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "048fa2fd96c898c4cc9e12219cba2a4f00ceef52"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "317394ca84258e4f11a138014820eebf0c43db1e" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "8faa87a6e6bbb0a5c16591e8b0adf0514cb33444" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb #KERNEL_SRC_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" #SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip-sdmafix" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "5b97eae48fd356d280815cb6088eff79570735f9" #SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${KERNEL_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" EOF
